wait a minute/second/moment etc.translat: used to ask someone not to leave or start doing something immediately
Wait a second, I’ll get my coat and come with you.
Wait a moment, just let me think.
used to interrupt someone, especially because you do not agree with what they are saying
Wait a minute! That’s not what we agreed!
used when you suddenly think of, remember, or notice something
Wait a minute, I’ve got a better idea.
